Introducing the New Line of SLOW POUR SUPPLY® x WPM Monochrome Handleless Milk Pitchers:

A Blend of Contemporary and Functionality

Step up your coffee game with our latest innovation: the Monochrome Handleless Milk Pitcher line. This sleek and stylish pitcher combines modern design elements with exceptional functionality, making it an essential tool for baristas and coffee enthusiasts alike.

Now available in beautiful new packaging!

Experience the Difference:

  • Round Spout: Prepare to create bold, dramatic patterns and pour with lightning-fast precision. Our round spout is specifically engineered to deliver bold and contrasting latte art patterns and ensure rapid service pours. Best for tulips, bold rosettas, hearts and fast pouring styles

  • Monochrome Color: Choose sophistication with our Model #14 in #06 Spout. This 15oz handleless pitcher features a monochrome color scheme, adding a touch of understated elegance to your coffee station. It's a statement piece that speaks volumes about your dedication to quality and style.

  • Signature WPM Design: Our handleless pitcher features the WPM original, unique slanted top design, setting it apart from traditional milk pitchers. This distinctive shape not only adds visual appeal but also provides a ideal flow dynamics. The ergonomic grip, ensuring comfort and precision while pouring. It's innovation you can feel.

Unmatched Quality and Durability:

  • Premium Materials: Crafted from 304 18/8 stainless steel, our pitcher guarantees durability and longevity. The uncoated, food-safe interior ensures the purity of your milk, maintaining its quality without compromising taste.

  • Patterned Silicone Wrap: We understand the importance of a secure grip. That's why our handleless pitcher comes with a patterned silicone wrap that not only adds a touch of contemporary flair but also provides a comfortable and slip-resistant hold. Your hands will thank you.

  • Wide Diameter: Designed with a wide diameter, our pitcher accommodates frothing skill from beginner to professional - a wider diameter also ensure realistic assessment of foam distribution.

Beauty Meets Versatility:

  • Stunning Colors: Our handleless milk pitcher is available in four captivating colors: Marigold, Marina Blue, Aubergine, and Matte White. Whether you prefer a vibrant pop or a minimalist aesthetic, we have a shade to match your personal style. Elevate your coffee setup with a touch of visual brilliance.

  • 6oz Milk Volume Indicator: Achieve precision in your measurements with the WPM signature slanted top design, featuring a convenient 6oz milk volume indicator. No more guessing games or wasted milk. This pitcher is designed to enhance your workflow and make every pour count.

Upgrade your coffee experience with the New Monochrome Handleless Milk Pitcher, where innovation meets beauty. Embrace the art of pouring with confidence, and indulge in the seamless fusion of style and functionality. 

Slow Pour Supply - we speak pitchers like nobody else

*please note that the Matte White version comes in past version black packaging 

Colors of actual products might show up slightly different than in the product photos. This is due to the various settings of monitors. Every monitor or mobile display has a different capability to display colors, and every individual may see these colors differently. In addition, lighting conditions at the time the photo was taken can also affect an image's color.

Products that have a shimmering coating will also show differently under different lighting setup. Colors might appear different even under a fluorescent light or a warmer shade bulb.

Perfect for 6-8oz cups, these pitchers come with a 6oz milk volume indicator. Replacing the traditional 12oz pitchers for a more horizontal flow, enabling a less drastic initial contact. This gives the cup more contrast and higher color definition. This is our most popular size.

ROUND SPOUT

Lipped round spout for bolder lines, this pitcher is great for thicker lines - slozettas, rosetta revolution, tulips, wing bases with thicker lines, and stacks. This pitcher is great for a higher flow rate. Available in our 10oz and 15oz pitchers

Slow Pour Supply WPM pitchers have proven to be superb in functionality, practicality, and accessibility - from your local neighborhood shops to national level competitions. You can find them on stage with the National Latte Art Champions, Barista Champions, as well as Coffeefest Latte Art World Championship Open winners, Slow Pour WPM pitchers accompany them on stage for an unparalleled flow control experience.

We offer four different size pitchers specifically for various specialty cup sizes.

15oz Pitcher: 6-10oz

17oz Pitcher: 8-12oz

22oz Pitcher: 12-16oz

Revolutionary-smooth foam roll - perfect for any drawing style

The WPM #30 600cc flat top pitcher is a 2022 new release

This pitcher focuses on optimizing the commonly available pitcher design - incorporating new elements to functionally improve the common flat top pitcher.

The spout of this flat top pitcher has been redesigned to provide a flow that benefits mix foam use. Excellent for drawing style, its round-bottom design enables a smooth rollover of foam - and latte artists are able to fully utilize every drop of milk for their pours.

At 600cc / 20oz size - this pitcher is perfect for pouring 10oz combination pour style patterns. The lengthened spout at a carefully designed angle works in tandem with a specially designed spout for a controlled flow.

 

Volume: 600cc/ 20oz

Color: Coconut white / Matte Black

Angled handle for a natural, pencil-like grip

Origami Porcelain cups are high density Mino-ware products that are fired for 12 hours under 2750˚F. The result is a durable product with high heat retaining properties.

All Origami products are designed with usage and comfort in mind - from flow dynamics to lip contact, the ORIGAMI team conducts extensive research on the shape of the vessel as well as thickness of the side walls. The result is the ultimate design to maximize the enjoyment from pouring to serving!
